bevi | Boston, MA | ONSITE | full time

We are a well-funded hardware/software start-up. Bevi is redesigning the beverage supply chain with machines that purify water and make customized drinks in seconds. Our system vastly cuts the cost and carbon footprint of beverages. http://bevi.co/

Full-stack software developer http://bevi.co/careers.html#full-stack--mobile-software-deve... Our ideal candidate, while having his areas of expertise, will not shy away from digging into any part of our software: firmware, mobile applications, web ui and backend. The interview process includes a coding test.
